name: DataVisualizerHack
tagline: Worked on analyzing reviews from the yelp dataset, performing keyword extraction, sentiment analysis and generating a word cloud for beter summarization/visualization of the reviews
body:
My hack at #HackIllinois

Motivation - to help users better understand reviews.

Summary - Worked on analyzing reviews from the yelp dataset, performing keyword extraction, sentiment analysis and generating a word cloud for beter summarization/visualization of the reviews. The system is generic and will be able to handle any dataset that is plugged in.

Steps -

    You can download the dataset at http://www.yelp.com/dataset_challenge
    Set up and run Elasticsearch.
    Process the dataset and index the required data.
    Helper scripts to perform various tasks like - process data, load data from dataset, keyword extraction and sentiment analysis, split data for elasticsearch bulk processing, searchapi and flask server.
    For UI used bootstrap

External APIs used

    Alchemy API for advanced text analysis.
    Bootstrap for UI.
    Flask to serve requests in a RESTful way.
    ElasticSearch for indexing and searching.
    NLTK for language modelling
